ru.myx.ae3.binary

Interface TransferBuffer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BufferFileComplete

    @ReflectionManual
public interface TransferBuffer
    Some number of immediately available bytes whose count is well known. There are number of methods available to read data from buffer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TransferBuffer NUL_BUFFER
      NUL BUFFER instance - empty buffer
      static BaseObject PROTOTYPE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroy()
      Releases anything associated with this buffer.
      java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigest()
      Returns a checksum.
      boolean hasRemaining()
      Tells whether this buffer has any remaining bytes.
      boolean isDirectAbsolutely()
      Returns true if this buffer is backed by a byte array or can be easily converted to it without any memory allocations, byte movements and so on..
      boolean isSequence()
      Returns true if this buffer represents a sequence of multiple buffers.
      int next()
      Returns next byte from buffer.
      int next(byte[] buffer, int offset, int length)
      Returns number of bytes actually written to buffer.
      TransferBuffer nextSequenceBuffer()
      Returns next buffer in sequence when isSequence() returns true.
      long remaining()
      Returns an amount of unread bytes from this buffer.
      TransferCopier toBinary()
      Returns a buffer factory for cloning this original buffer with its current state.
      byte[] toDirectArray()
      Returns array of bytes remaining in buffer, buffer is empty after this method is returned.
      java.io.InputStream toInputStream()
      Returns an InputStream of data remaining in buffer, buffer is empty after this method is returned.
      TransferBuffer toNioBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer target)
      Transfers buffer contents to a specified nio buffer.
      java.io.Reader toReaderUtf8() 
      String toString()
      Returns a string representation of buffer contents, buffer is empty after this method returns.
      String toString(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Returns a string as if it was constructed via new String(toDirectArray(), charset), buffer is empty after this method is returned.
      String toString(String encoding)
      Returns a string as if it was constructed via new String(toDirectArray(), charset), buffer is empty after this method is returned.
      TransferBuffer toSubBuffer(long start, long end)
      Returns a buffer containing specified slice of this buffer.
      java.security.MessageDigest updateMessageDigest(java.security.MessageDigest digest)
      Returns a checksum.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        @ReflectionExplicit
void destroy()
        Releases anything associated with this buffer. Anyway the buffer will be destroyed in finalize method or when the end of buffer reached.

      • getMessageDigest

        @ReflectionExplicit
java.security.MessageDigest getMessageDigest()
        Returns a checksum.
        Returns:
        checksum

      • hasRemaining

        @ReflectionExplicit
boolean hasRemaining()
        Tells whether this buffer has any remaining bytes. Should be equivalent to expression: "remaining() > 0".
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isDirectAbsolutely

        @ReflectionExplicit
boolean isDirectAbsolutely()
        Returns true if this buffer is backed by a byte array or can be easily converted to it without any memory allocations, byte movements and so on..
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isSequence

        @ReflectionExplicit
boolean isSequence()
        Returns true if this buffer represents a sequence of multiple buffers.
        Returns:
        boolean

      • next

        @ReflectionExplicit
int next()
        Returns next byte from buffer.
        Returns:
        int

      • next

        int next(byte[] buffer,
         int offset,
         int length)
        Returns number of bytes actually written to buffer. Must write Math.min(remaining, length) bytes!
        Parameters:
        buffer -
        offset -
        length -
        Returns:
        int

      • nextSequenceBuffer

        @ReflectionExplicit
TransferBuffer nextSequenceBuffer()
        Returns next buffer in sequence when isSequence() returns true.
        Returns:
        buffer

      • remaining

        @ReflectionExplicit
long remaining()
        Returns an amount of unread bytes from this buffer.
        Returns:
        int

      • toBinary

        @ReflectionExplicit
TransferCopier toBinary()
        Returns a buffer factory for cloning this original buffer with its current state. Current buffer becomes empty and useless after this operation.
        Returns:
        copier

      • toDirectArray

        @ReflectionExplicit
byte[] toDirectArray()
        Returns array of bytes remaining in buffer, buffer is empty after this method is returned.
        Returns:
        byte array

      • toInputStream

        @ReflectionExplicit
java.io.InputStream toInputStream()
        Returns an InputStream of data remaining in buffer, buffer is empty after this method is returned.
        Returns:
        input stream

      • toNioBuffer

        @ReflectionExplicit
TransferBuffer toNioBuffer(java.nio.ByteBuffer target)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Transfers buffer contents to a specified nio buffer. attempts to write this buffer contents to a specified nio buffer the actual number of bytes written is minimum of number of bytes available to read from this buffer and number of bytes available to write in given nio buffer. Returns a transfer buffer holding remaining data or null when all data was transferred.
        Parameters:
        target -
        Returns:
        buffer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toReaderUtf8

        @ReflectionExplicit
java.io.Reader toReaderUtf8()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • toString

        String toString()
        Returns a string representation of buffer contents, buffer is empty after this method returns. Any binary-to-character conversions (if any) are performed using system-default locale and encoding.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • toString

        @ReflectionExplicit
String toString(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Returns a string as if it was constructed via new String(toDirectArray(), charset), buffer is empty after this method is returned.
        Parameters:
        charset -
        Returns:
        string

String toString(String encoding)

      • toSubBuffer

        @ReflectionExplicit
TransferBuffer toSubBuffer(long start,
                                               long end)
                                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a buffer containing specified slice of this buffer. Current buffer becomes empty and useless after this operation.
        Parameters:
        start -
        end -
        Returns:
        buffer
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when bounds are out of buffer.
